name: online-quiz-portal-website
description: ## Features: * Working with complex MongoDB, queries, schemas, models. * Separate User Interfaces for Users, Admins. * JWT Authentication and Password Hashing. * Admin can add exams with questions , options and answers. * Real time updates for all the crud operations in Questions and Exams Module. * Timer functionality for Exam Sessions. * Live Result Functionality after writting the exams. * Storing the results into Mongo DB. * Separate Reports / Analatics functionality for both Admin and User.

scripts.build: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && npm run build
